conversation.message: Hello School_D admissions team—I'm Student_C. School_D is my first-choice school, and I’m applying because I strongly want to join your community. If admitted, I will accept and commit to enrolling. Thank you for considering my application.

Although School_D ranks me 4th (behind Student_B, Student_D, Student_E), applying immediately is still best because (1) it is my highest preference, and (2) early commitment could matter if higher-priority students pursue other schools first. I will apply with a clear, enthusiastic message to maximize my chance of acceptance if I become the best available candidate.

conversation.message:

Since we can only match with one student and Student_B (our top choice) has applied to us this round, accepting Student_C now would forgo a higher-priority feasible match. Therefore we should reject Student_C to preserve capacity for Student_B. Student_C also has School_C as second choice, so they have alternatives.
